name: oh-my-copy
description: Copy selected code with file and line context for Codex CLI

ohMyCopy.outputTemplate.description: Output template. Supported placeholders: {file}, {lines}, {code}. The {code} value is wrapped as a template literal.

ohMyCopy.compactCodeToSingleLine.description: Collapse all whitespace in selected code to single spaces before rendering {code}.

ohMyCopy.enableAntigravityClipboardFallb.description: If the editor app is Antigravity, prefer shell clipboard command fallback before VS Code clipboard API.

ohMyCopy.antigravityCopyCommand.description: Optional Antigravity-only copy command. If empty, defaults to pbcopy(macOS), clip(Windows), xclip(Linux).

ohMyCopy.includeLineRangeForMultiline.description: Use line range (e.g. 10-15) when the selection spans multiple lines.

ohMyCopy.copyCommand.description: Optional shell command to receive the formatted content via stdin. Leave empty to use VS Code clipboard API.

ohMyCopy.showNotification.description: Show a confirmation notification after copying.

scripts.pretest: bun run compile && bun run lint
